long_description: The women's Merrell Jungle Glove shoes combine the ease of the ever-popular Merrell slip-on moc with smooth leather uppers and the simplicity of barefoot construction for everyday wear. Pig suede leather uppers ensure long-lasting wear. 0mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike. Elastic stretch bands allow easy on and off. M-Select FRESH natural enzymes help prevent odors from developing. Merrell Jungle Glove shoes feature grippy Vibram(R) outsoles that provide reliable traction.
short_description: The women's Merrell Jungle Glove shoes combine the ease of the ever-popular Merrell slip-on moc with smooth leather uppers and the simplicity of barefoot construction for everyday wear.
